section1_title.default: Your Code Analyzer Teammate Is Ready to Go

section1_content.default: An out-of-the-box AI agent that automatically reviews every PR in GitHub, helping your team ship quality code without getting stuck in review purgatory.

section2_title.default: Code Reviews That Don’t Slow You Down

section2_content.default: The Code Analyzer Teammate is your team’s secret to cleaner code and faster merges. It connects to GitHub out-of-the-box, analyzing each pull request in depth and flagging risks, missing tests, and failing checks. Just turn it on, find your flow, and sail smoothly through every review.

section3_title.default: Out-of-the-Box Connectors for All Your AI Teammates

section4_content.default: Edge Delta’s Code Analyzer Teammate is one of many specialized, collaborative AI agents that are helping teams around the world do their best work.

section5_item1_content.default: Analyzes diffs, comments, reviews, and build statuses, freeing up the humans to focus on innovation and ensuring issues don’t slip through the cracks.

section5_item2_content.default: Gives helpful feedback and updates in out-of-the-box channels, keeping everyone — from humans to other agents — in the loop.

section5_item3_content.default: Operates read-only by default; any suggested reviewers, comments, or labels require human approval. Every action is logged for transparency, with minimal metadata.
